name: Statute of limitation for criminal penalties Recovery of Money Owed to the State
text:
Statute of limitation for criminal penalties.  Notwithstanding any laws to the contrary, prosecutions under sections 231-34, 231-35, 231-36, and 231-7.5 shall be commenced within seven years after the commission of the offense. [L 1995, c 92, pt of §2; am L 2009, c 166, §23]
 
Note
 
  Applicability of 2009 amendment.  L 2009, c 166, §27.
